pageProduct.name: Alkira Detoxifying Pink Clay Facial Masque 100ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Australian Pink Clay + Cleansing Botanicals. Our Pink Clay masque is a magnet for toxins formulated to purify and tighten pores, clear congestion and manage breakouts.

Warnings

Avoid contact with eyes. If irritation occurs, rinse immediately and discontinue use. We recommend patch testing. For external use only.

Common Uses

Key Benefits: • Detoxifying and pore minimising Pink Australian Clay • Skin correcting Green Tea and Rosehip • Calm and reduce inflammation and redness with Cucumber and Chamomile • Naturally astringent Witch Hazel • Increase hydration with Avocado and Evening Primrose

Ingredients

Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Kaolin, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Cetearyl Alcohol, Glycerin, Cetearyl Alcohol, Bentonite, Palmitic Acid, Ceteareth-20, Stearic Acid, Rosa Canina (Rosehip) Fruit Oil, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Oenothera Biennis (Evening Primrose) Oil, Calendula Officinalis (Calendula) Flower Extract, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Extract, Chamomilla Recutita Flower Extract, Hamamelis Virginiana (Witch Hazel) Leaf Extract, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Tocopherol, Water (Aqua), Xanthan Gum, Quartz, Citric Acid, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Phenoxyethanol, Benzyl Alcohol, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77492, CI 7749, CI 77499)

Directions

Apply to damp face and neck. Relax and allow to penetrate for 15 minutes. Rinse off with warm water and wash cloth
